alert.note: Alert for Prairie; Wibaux (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 20 at 2:34PM MST until February 21 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Visibility reduced to a half mile. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Prairie and Wibaux Counties. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Ranchers should take action to protect newborn livestock.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
